thread.title: Bill Walton changed his shirt mid-broadcast, horrifies woman in crowd
thread.title_full: Bill Walton changed his shirt mid-broadcast, horrifies woman in crowd

author: Matt Ellentuck (matthew.ellentuck@performgroup.com)
title: Bill Walton changed his shirt mid-broadcast, horrifies woman in crowd
text:
February 25, 2017 7:47pm   7:47pm EST Oh wow, this woman was surprised at what she saw. Bill Walton (Getty) 
Updated at 7:47 p.m. ET 
Updated at 7:47 p.m. ET 
Bill Walton finds new ways to entertain on air all of the time, and it's nearly never with stunning analysis. But that's OK. 
Walton is on television to do things like take his shirt off in the middle of an arena on air and show us his out of shape body. He's one-of-a-kind. Bill Walton changed shirts live on air and the woman behind him was not thrilled pic.twitter.com/yNFsKyvDUb
